description: Commands to manage a HCX addon.

commands.name: az vmware addon hcx create
commands.summary: Create a HCX addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon hcx create --offer
                           --private-cloud
                           --resource-group
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az vmware addon hcx create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud --offer "VMware MaaS Cloud Provider (Enterprise)"

commands.name: az vmware addon hcx delete
commands.summary: Delete a HCX addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon hcx delete [--ids]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--private-cloud]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--yes]
examples: az vmware addon hcx delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware addon hcx show
commands.summary: Show details of a HCX addon for a private cloud.
examples: az vmware addon hcx show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware addon hcx update
commands.summary: Update a HCX addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon hcx update --offer
                           [--add]
                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--ids]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--private-cloud]
                           [--remove]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--set]
                           [--subscription]
examples: az vmware addon hcx update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud --offer "VMware MaaS Cloud Provider (Enterprise)"
